# We need a supporting form for your Supplemental Claim

Dear <redacted>,

You submitted a Supplemental Claim (VA Form 20-0995) on VA.gov on <redacted>, but there was a problem with our system. We couldn't process your supporting form. We're sorry about this.

In order for us to request your non-VA records, you'll need to resubmit an Authorization to Disclose Information to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA Form 21-4142 and 21-4142a). Submit this form as soon as possible.

## What to do next
We recommend resubmitting your VA Form 21-4142 online or by mail as soon as possible.

### Option 1: Submit your form online
The fastest way to submit this form is online on VA.gov.

[Submit VA Form 21-4142 and 21-4142a on VA.gov](https://www.va.gov/supporting-forms-for-claims/release-information-to-va-form-21-4142)

### Option 2: Submit your form by mail
You can also print the form, fill it out, and mail it to us.
[Get VA Form 21-4142 and 21-4142a on VA.gov](https://www.va.gov/find-forms/about-form-21-4142/)

(address)Department of Veterans Affairs | Evidence Intake Center | PO Box 4444 | Janesville, WI 53547-4444

> ## Submission Details
> ### Form submitted
> **Authorization to Disclose Information to the Department of Veterans Affairs**
> VA Form 21-4142 and 21-4142a
>
> ### Date submitted
> <redacted>
>
> ### Submitted with
> **Decision Reviews Request: Supplemental Claim**
> VA Form 20-0995

## What to do if you have questions
Call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711). We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

Thank you

<hr>

You're receiving this email because you submitted a form on [VA.gov](http://www.va.gov). Don't reply to this email.
